channel.title: Resume on TChilderhose
channel.description: Recent content in Resume on TChilderhose

item.title: Resume Revamp
item.description: We’ve currently been hiring at work and I’ve seen about 200+ resumes in a short amount of time. While reviewing them, I made the realization that the visuals of a resume effected me more than I thought it would. Which made me also realize it might be time to update and upgrade my resume in terms of visuals, content and flow.
